text: is a retired Japanese long jumper. She placed 12th at the 1960 Summer Olympics and won a silver medal at the 1962 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Japanese female long jumpers Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Fumiko Ito
